sentences.en: Does this unfortunate news augur war in the near future?
sentences.cn: 这个不幸消息预示最近的将来会发生战争 吗 ?

sentences.en: Every year we have charity days to raise money for unfortunate people.
sentences.cn: 每年我们都有慈善日来筹款帮助贫困人群。

sentences.en: He hurled curses at the unfortunate man who had made the mistake.
sentences.cn: 他对着这个犯了错误的可怜人大声叫骂.

sentences.en: He was unfortunate to lose in the final round.
sentences.cn: 他不幸在最后一轮输了。

sentences.en: His inaptitude for the job is very unfortunate.
sentences.cn: 非常遗憾他对此工作无法胜任.

sentences.en: I count myself to be unfortunate.
sentences.cn: 我认为我自己时运不佳.

sentences.en: I sincerely pity these unfortunate beings.
sentences.cn: 我真诚地同情这些不幸的人.

sentences.en: It really is desperately unfortunate that this should have happened just now.
sentences.cn: 刚才竟发生这样的事儿，实在是太不合时宜了。

sentences.en: It's unfortunate when a father and son can't relate to each other.
sentences.cn: 父子之间关系不好是很不幸的.

sentences.en: She couldn't resist a dig at Dave after his unfortunate performance.
sentences.cn: 戴夫糟糕的表演结束后，她忍不住想挖苦他一番。

sentences.en: She was always good with the unfortunate.
sentences.cn: 她对不幸的人总是很友好.

sentences.en: Some unfortunate person passing below could all too easily be seriously injured.
sentences.cn: 从下面经过的倒霉蛋儿很容易受重伤。

sentences.en: Through some unfortunate accident, the information reached me a day late.
sentences.cn: 由于发生了不幸的意外，我知道消息的时候已经晚了一天。

sentences.en: When we entered the room, the teacher was yelling at some unfortunate student.
sentences.cn: 我们进教室的时候，老师正在对着一个倒霉的学生吼叫。

trans.tran_cn: 不幸的，不恰当的，穷困潦倒的
trans.tran_en: someone who is unfortunate has something bad happen to them
